description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9b8gf","text":"Sera from patients in our UCSF Liver Transplant Biobank are used to stimulate human pulmonary microvascular endothelial cells (HPMECs) grown to confluency on ECIS platform. This protocol prospectively defines the plan for data analysis from these experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.section: ECIS Data Analysis for HPMEC stimulation by Liver Biobank Sera
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9mpa2","text":"Determine Difference in Area-under-the-Curve (Normalized Resistance at 4000 Hz)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":79}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56v0v","text":"To be calculated after recording full ECIS curve after stimulation with human serum from liver transplant (LT) patients.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8i75v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1t6uc","text":"Goal: To calculate the difference in AUC between the normalized ECIS curves generated by (a) Liver transplant serum and (b) Healthy pooled serum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":90,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":121,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e4u9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"960g7","text":"  ΔAUC = AUCLT serum - AUCHealthy pooled serum","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":12,"length":9},{"style":"sub","offset":26,"length":20},{"style":"italic","offset":12,"length":9},{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6kqbh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hvi8","text":"Sign conventions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"iecm","text":"Baseline resistance is normalized to 1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lsfb","text":"AUC of curve that drops below 1 = Negative AUC --\u003e interpreted as an increase in EC permeability","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61iir","text":"AUC of curve that rises above 1 = Positive AUC","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4m96l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0ijc","text":"e.g., for a typical Liver serum sample that induces permeability:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":65}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4suku","text":"AUCLT serum = Negative number","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":3,"length":9},{"style":"italic","offset":3,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1rhq","text":"AUCHealthy pooled serum = Positive number","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":3,"length":21},{"style":"italic","offset":3,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5b72g","text":"ΔAUC = Negative number - Positive number = Large negative number","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2igef","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aduvq","text":"e.g., for a typical Liver serum sample that does not induce much permeability:","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":78}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63a3h","text":"AUCLT serum = Smaller positive number","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":3,"length":9},{"style":"italic","offset":3,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d1p2","text":"AUCHealthy pooled serum = Larger positive number","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":3,"length":21},{"style":"italic","offset":3,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gdku","text":"ΔAUC = Smaller positive number - Larger positive number = Small negative number","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aas0e","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dlicf","text":"Final AUC analysis will use data from 0-3 hrs.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"","guid":"","id":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ps84","text":"Duplicate X-Y tables with data from 0-6 hrs --\u003e name duplicate \"_adjustedt_0-3h\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":64,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a6ft7","text":"Cell line #","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ulhj","text":"Passage #","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu31v","text":"Old plate (yes/no)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nt0t","text":"Seeding density (cells/well) - should be 40,000","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":31,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1bba","text":"Plateau capacitance at 64,000 Hz, average and st. dev - prior to stimulation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":56,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd2a","text":"Plateau resistance at 4,000 Hz, average and st. dev - prior to stimulation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":54,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72itb","text":"Time of stimulation - elapsed from seeding ECIS plate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":22,"length":20},{"style":"italic","offset":43,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bfd9v","text":"Create X-Y data Table with n replicates, plot average curves with error bars from 0-6 h:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":27,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdria","text":"    Healthy serum with positive controls {LPS, TNF, IL-1b} and negative control {Media} - one for each day of experiment","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":90,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22gjr","text":"    Healthy serum with Liver serum {S1, S2, S3, S4, S5} - one for each patient","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":58,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1di5e","text":"Using ECIS software, normalize the resistance. This is done by dividing the resistance at each time point by the baseline resistance (the plateau resistance reached just prior to stimulation with serum). This will set the baseline resistance = 1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3725a","text":"Analyze --\u003e XY analyses --\u003e Area under curve","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87pbf","text":"Baseline Y = 1","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dops9","text":"Minimum Peak Height = ignore peaks \u003c 5%","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dj14","text":"Minimum Peak Width = leave blank","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nf1n","text":"Peak direction = \"Also consider 'peaks' that go below the baseline.\"","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"99dlj","text":"Align time = 0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fsg","text":"Inspect normalized curves for a given experiment (day and cell line)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77gbe","text":"Determine time point (tstim) where curves begin to diverge from baseline resistance = 1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":22,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":23,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"451ne","text":"The time point prior to that time (tstim-1) will be set = 0 hrs","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":35,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":36,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rrh1","text":"This time shift is achieved by:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"569rc","text":"tadjusted = toriginal - tstim-1","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":12,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":24,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":1,"length":11},{"style":"sub","offset":13,"length":11},{"style":"sub","offset":25,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"p3ph","text":"Use tadjusted for determination of AUC 0-3 hrs.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":5,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"kqgb","text":"Perform one-way ANOVA with the following pairwise comparisons:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bkut","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqgqm","text":"Note: Control Column should be S1, Start of Surgery for all","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4j21q","text":"    S1 vs. Healthy Serum - Q: Is liver serum at the start of surgery different from Healthy controls?","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":27,"length":74}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chmh8","text":"    S1 vs. S2 - Q: What is the effect of surgery (dissection phase) alone with no liver reperfusion?","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":16,"length":84}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqvn7","text":"    S1 vs. S3 - Q: What is the effect of liver reperfusion?","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":16,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"el9m5","text":"    S1 vs. {S4 or S5} - Q: If there is an effect of liver reperfusion, does it get worse with more time from reperfusion?","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":24,"length":97}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etru8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmpsh","text":"Note: If both S4 and S5 are present, keep whichever is \"less\" (i.e., keep the more negative, or less positive AUC)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jruf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d81dj","text":"S1 = Start of Surgery","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qqfi","text":"S2 = End of Dissection (before liver removal)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cp61a","text":"S3 = 15 min after Portal Vein reperfusion","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ccnn","text":"S4 = 60 min after Portal Vein reperfusion","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51th4","text":"S5 = 120 min after Portal Vein reperfusion (or End of Surgery, whichever comes first)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccjnl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"749s2","text":"Calculate ΔAUC","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eg2t6","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37dec","text":"ΔAUC = AUCLT serum - AUCHealthy pooled serum","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":10,"length":9},{"style":"sub","offset":24,"length":20},{"style":"italic","offset":10,"length":9},{"style":"italic","offset":24,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avjdb","text":"","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84ada","text":"Generally 3 replicates, occasionally 2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5uhqg","text":"From AUC Results --\u003e Record \"Net Area\" and \"Std Error\" in a new \"Grouped\" Prism Table (use Paste Transpose)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":8},{"style":"bold","offset":44,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":65,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":91,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ajgra","text":"Standard error calculation for ΔAUC","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43oi3","text":"","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cnrg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9m8t7","text":"Std ErrorΔAUC =  ","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":9,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":9,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3cogn","text":"Where:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg2vu","text":"dx = Std ErrorAUC, LT serum","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":2},{"style":"italic","offset":14,"length":13},{"style":"sub","offset":14,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bbp0","text":"dy = Std ErrorAUC, Healthy pooled serum","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":2},{"style":"italic","offset":14,"length":25},{"style":"sub","offset":14,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i73o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f489u","text":"Standard errors are obtained from the \"Net Area\" section of the Results tab in Prism after an AUC analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":39,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"sqrt(dx^2 + dy^2)","guid":"","id":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fm0n","text":"Upload ΔAUC0 to 3 h in REDCap for each patient, timepoint, and cell line.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":9},{"style":"sub","offset":11,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4b0ok","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d3p4","text":"REDCap variables for Cell Line #1 are named:","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6t76o","text":"auc_mean_ln1_s1","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cu0s","text":"auc_se_ln1_s1","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekdrh","text":"auc_mean_ln1_s2","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8274","text":"auc_se_ln1_s2","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3j6av","text":"...","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjf31","text":"auc_mean_ln1_s5","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckt45","text":"auc_se_ln1_s5","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d37ot","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flog9","text":"... similarly for Cell Line #2:","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cle2h","text":"auc_mean_ln2_s1","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4a2k","text":"auc_se_ln2_s1","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
